https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/8zy6qVeJCadt67r8xXlqo2xEa2t.jpg A railroad worker (Won Poong Yeon, Seven Days) wearily sets out for his last day of work, carrying his usual bread and milk. When he approaches a hill, he decides to commit suicide and lies down on the rails. As the train approaches him, suddenly, a big jagged rock falls on the rail, leaving him stuck in the gap between the train wheels and the rock. Bread and Milk
